response.overview: The BeBe and CeCe show is a reboot of the original shorts with the same name from 1998 to 2000 and was revived again by cartoon network from 2008 to 2014 it centers around the same premise where their characters from The proud family and cartoon network wanted to revive the show because they thought it would resonate with the proud familys audience but however it was too niche.
response.title: The Bebe and CeCe show
